Key Match Events: Yoane Wissa scored a penalty to give DR Congo a 2-1 lead
Arthur Masuaku scored a goal in the 82nd minute to give DR Congo a commanding 3-1 lead
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game's turning point came in the 65th minute
DR Congo is set to face host Ivory Coast or Mali in the semifinals on Wednesday next week
Others: The first half of the game ended with both teams locked in a 1-1 draw
DR Congo captain Chancel Mbemba equalized for his team in the 27th minute
